articles.author: Kate Bartlett
articles.title: G20 summit closes in South Africa after U.S. absence - NPR
articles.description: The G20 closed in Johannesburg without a ceremonial hand over to the U.S., its next chair, after Washington boycotted the summit.
articles.content: JOHANNESBURG, South Africa This weekend's G20 Leaders' Summit in South Africa was unusual for several reasons. The first summit on the African continent was also the first time the U.S. had boycotted… [+3992 chars]
